title: Customer uses advanced payment instruments Snapshot

view.title: Customer uses advanced payment instruments
view.subtitle: Advanced split-tender flow executed and traceable through intent/tender/line allocations.

blocks.title: Customer Advanced Payment Flow completed
blocks.message: Advanced split-tender flow executed and traceable through intent/tender/line allocations.

blocks.title: What user sees at a glance

resultPayload.note: Advanced split-tender flow executed and traceable through intent/tender/line allocations.

data.instruction: Create at least one host resource and one non-host resource (asset or venue) suitable for the UC.
data.expectedResult: Resources are created with expected type, location, and buffers.

data.instruction: Query and compare availability + bookings timeline for the entities involved in this scenario.
data.expectedResult: Calendar state reflects booked slots, blocks, and any conflict outcomes from previous steps.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Versioned Quote-to-Order Acceptance Flow. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Query and compare availability + bookings timeline for the entities involved in this scenario.
data.expectedResult: Calendar state reflects booked slots, blocks, and any conflict outcomes from previous steps.
